title: Author Cohen: 'The Sun & The Moon & The Rolling Stones' (Audio)
itunes:title: Author Cohen: 'The Sun & The Moon & The Rolling Stones' (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Author Richard Cohen on his new book, "The Sun & The Moon & The Rolling Stones," and what drove the Stones' business success.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
